评论详情: I normally wearing a size 9. Their 9 was enormous. I ordered an 8.5. it was a little small so I ordered a 8.5 wide, which was massive, but not at the toes, it was as long as the 9 was. Dont buy these unless you plan on multiple returns
Bought these for my husband and he really likes them! They run true to size:)
I love the look. Very versatile use. Not very breathable material. Price is great

评论概述: you get what you pay for
评论详情: Wanted to use these chores for work and after a month i already had a hole on the bottom of on of them shoes. Both shoes eventually ended up getting holes on the bottom of them.

评论概述: Sorta Get What You Pay For
评论详情: I purchased these shoes on 6 Oct. The price was great, the shoes looked great, and they were comfortable. I used them for walking around the house, shopping, and walking outside, but no exercise or anything extreme at all. Unfortunately, you only get what you pay for with these shoes because they only last 3 months. I attached pictures showing the shoes falling apart.  This inside sole is coming loose causing slight discomfort on my foot. I could get past this because I can buy inserts and replace them. However, also the bottom of the shoes has lost its integrity completely, causing them not to be water-tight and allowing debris to get in. I understand these shoes were priced low, but they didn't even last a full three months without completely falling apart, and they do not perform their basic function anymore.
I bought this for my son to wear to an all white party.  Hopefully they will look good with white pants and shirt for the summer white parties.

评论概述: They wear down really easily and the rubber sole tore after 2 months of wearing
评论详情: I liked them over all but they have since purchase let water in through the bottom. The rubber sole has torn which is unfortunate.
My shoes fell apart after six weeks of wearing them. There is a crack in the sole and the siding came unglued / unstitched.
I bought these for my vacation and I keept them on all day . My foot was very comfortable and didn’t notice any sweat at all. Good product for the price.
Nice looking but they are way smaller than average sizes. Extra wide was extra tight.
Terrible shoe. I wear these very occasionally and found the sole broken in 2 months.

I am very pleased with this product, especially in relation to the price. The insoles are NOT the kind that slide out when you take off the shoe, and I'd say they are true to size. They're comfortable, and so far, I'd say they're well made. I didn't mark a 5-star rating, as I haven't had them long enough to go that far.
These are comfortable knock around shoes. The lining on the inside heal has worn away. Otherwise, they look good and are not showing signs of wear.

Ordered my correct usual size, they didn't fit, not even close.  And I don't mean they were a little tight. Cinderella's sisters had an easier time trying to put on shoes. I couldn't even get all my toes in them successfully, barefoot.

评论概述: First pair of sneakers in years
评论详情: And. I will buy another one. Light comfy flexible. What more can u ask. And they look good with everything.

评论概述: 2-year report: was $11, worn almost daily, seams/sole inserts fell apart, sole rubber hardened
评论详情: - not the most comfortable pair of shoes. recommended for short distances around the garden or house. do not use this for standing or walking for long periods of time.  - the sole rubber hardens and do not provide a good cushioning support  - the sole inserts disintegrate around the 1-year mark.  - seams have separated.
Sole was detached from shoe resulting in it not being wearable :/
very comfy on my old feet they broke in in a few mins!!!

Easy to wear and very easy to maintain. Low maintenance shoes are the best. I’m thinking of copping another pair

评论概述: Don't last, sole worn after 3 months
评论详情: While sitting at the doctors office I happen to notice the bottom of my husbands shoe was very worn. He said he just bought them. Then he showed me the other sole and there's already a hole in it! Bought in September 2024, and he doesn't do anything other than walk in them. Won't buy again.
Will recommend this

评论详情: I don't know if I'll buy Lugz again. At least I'll try to make sure they don't have any leather-like material since they apparently can't be trusted to use that in their shoes.

I have had these shoes for just under a month and the bottom liner on the inside is already coming off. I work an office job 5 days a week and am mostly at a desk so it's not like they get used heavily. I have other shoes I wear outside of work hours. This is the second pair of lugz shoes that has done this shortly after purchasing them. The other pair is still fine otherwise as I am sure this pair will be. It is just an annoyance.
Bought 3-4 Months ago. Falling apart at this point. Its a fine, cheap shoe. But don't expect this to hold up.
Threw them out in six months. Wore a couple times a week with low amounts of walking. Walked through the ball of the feet. Good price for the quality but don’t expect anything long lasting.
Seems like a good quality bought it for my husband, looks good, he says they are comfortable,fits good.

评论概述: at least 1.5 sizes too small compared to other brands like skechers or nike
评论详情: Ordered size 9.5wide. ( which is the size I always order on all brands like skechers, adidas, nike etc..)  the shoe did not fit my foot it is at least 1.5 sizes too small compared to other brands. I ordered another reference but it has not arrived yet. let's see if it's the brand that runs small or if it's the model. so far not impressed by the brand or Amazon for that matter since they asked I return the shoes first before getting a replacement of a larger size.

评论概述: Sole split open in less than 2 months.

comfy and durable.  decent price too

评论详情: These are such a good option for people who want an affordable true white slip on. They're much more affordable than vans and still feel like a quality shoe.

评论概述: Not true to size at all.
评论详情: I first ordered an 8.5 in size and they where way to small. Sent them back and then ordered in a size 9.0 which are way too big. This doesn't make any sense to me?? I have never had an issue with shoes like this before. Very annoying. All my other Van's shoes and slip on's are 8.5 to 9.0 and all fit perfectly. Spend the extra money and buy Van's that are true to size.

评论概述: Runs really small, and a bit rough-cut inside
评论详情: I usually take a size 10, but I bought these half a size larger so I could slip them on easily to take the dog outside. The size 10.5 feels like a 9; narrow and pinches my arch. Also, the fabric overlaps inside and creates a bit of a ridge, which your foot can feel. Not loving them like I hoped I would.
good pair of everyday shoes

As a former skateboarder, I like these original style slip-on sneakers and these seemed like a good alternative to the “original” slip-on skateboarding shoe (you know who I’m talking about). Unfortunately these are even poorer in quality than the “originals” and only lasted a couple of months before the sole split and the upper fabric tore (and no, I’m no longer actually skateboarding in them - just walking around). Guess I’ll be looking at Sperry Topsiders next unless someone can suggest an alternative.
This shoe looks good, feels good and fits nicely.

The sole is sturdy and grippy, but the canvas upper is a bit thin and unstructured. Comfy slip ons for the summer and well worth the money.

This is my third pair. I have them in black with a white sole and in all black. Had to buy the set...in case the other 2 pairs didn't get a long.  Joking aside, they're extremely comfortable. I'm a size 11 wide. Finding stylish shoes in my size is always an issue. These shoes check off all the boxes without breaking the bank.
Very versatile and comfortable. Wear around the yard, for driving, and out and about....lasts well.
I originally got these in 10.5 regular and couldn't get my toes in!! Returned and got the 11 wide and they are a little tight which I think is what ypu want and fit so much better.

These shoes fell apart at record speed. I spend most of the day in work boots then throw these on in the evenings if I need to run to the store or something. They are barely worn and already the bottom failed.

Love these kicks, soo affordable over Vans and more available in hard to find size: 15 They fit a little snug on the edges at first, but but break in quickly. Will definitely buy again!  Available in Men and Women sizes, smaller sizes dont have the same "snugness". Great shoe!
